rejection.details:
We can only publish petitions that make a clear request for action by the Government or House of Commons, and it's not clear exactly what you want the Government or House of Commons to do.

Since you started your petition the Government has started easing the lockdown restrictions. You can read more about what you can and can't do here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/coronavirus-outbreak-faqs-what-you-can-and-cant-do/coronavirus-outbreak-faqs-what-you-can-and-cant-do

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign: 

End lockdown to prevent further economic damage to the UK’s economy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315979

We have also published a number of other petitions calling for changes to the Government's approach to Covid-19. You can find all petitions relating to Covid-19 here: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open&topic=covid-19
